text: My Mom's New Boyfriend is a 2008 German American romantic comedy thriller movie directed by George Gallo and starring Antonio Banderas, Meg Ryan, Colin Hanks, Selma Blair, Trevor Morgan, John Valdeterro, Eli Danker. == Other websites == * Category:2008 romantic comedy movies Category:2008 thriller movies Category:German romance movies Category:German comedy movies Category:German thriller movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by George Gallo
title: My Mom's New Boyfriend
